meta.article_title: Learn Something New Each Time You Play

learn-something-new-each-time-you-play.probleme: Do you learn something new each time you play?
causes_communes: You can learn from your opponents; from watching or talking to others; or from your own play.

debutant.description: Learn how to return a serve that gives you trouble.
Analyze and decide not to use a technique if it's not right for you.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Talk to knowledgeable players at your club
exercices_complementaires.description: Just talk to the knowledgeable players at your club, and you can learn all sorts of things.
